amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prioritize funding within the DHS Office of the Secretary to complete a study on the treatment of detainees and the conditions of private detention centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham, M. amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham, M..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
